channel.title: Postgresql on Xiao.chen

item.title: Postgresql common commands operations
item.description: Data export and import 1# install postgresql in macos 2brew install postgresql@15 3# settings to the path variable 4echo 'export PATH="/opt/homebrew/opt/postgresql@15/bin:$PATH"' >> ~/.zshrc 5 6# dump database to sql file 7pg_dump --host xxxxx.eu-west-1.compute.amazonaws.com --port 5432 --user username database > backup.sql 8 9# change username password 10ALTER USER user_name WITH PASSWORD 'new_password'; 11# import the data to postgresql 12psql --host x.x.x.x --user dba --db postgres < dump-xxx-xxxx.sql Reference Importing and exporting data in PostgreSQL
